directions: In a large bowl, dissolve candies in boiling water.  Add gelatin and stir until dissolved.  Stir in applesauce and a few ice cubes and chill for 3 hours, or until set.  Serve cold with whipped cream.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package lemon flavored Jell-O® mix
title: Applesauce Cinnamon Gelatin Salad
